full_summary:
**Gas Permeability Tester Tender Announcement**
==============================================

**Notice ID**: cb-7543-47504520
**Amendment Number**: 5
**Solicitation Number**: 25-58066
**Publication Date**: July 25, 2023
**Closing Date**: August 22, 2023, 2:00 p.m.
**Amendment Date**: September 21, 2023

**Description**
---------------

The National Research Council of Canada invites proponents to submit a proposal for the procurement of a Gas Permeability Tester. The Contractor must provide a Gas Permeability Tester that meets the requirements outlined in the Statement of Requirement at Annex "A".

**Key Dates**
-------------

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 20, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 20, 2025

**Important Notes**
-------------------

*   All inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than five (5) calendar days before the bid closing date. Late inquiries may not be answered.
*   The tender is **CANCELLED**.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   **Cindy Marshall**
    *   Email: [Cindy.Marshall@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Cindy.Marshall@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: 1 647 548 8469

**Attached Documents**
----------------------

*   English: [Template for Medium-Complexity Procurement (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7543/927616_rfp-template_medium-complexity_en_0.pdf)
*   French: [Template for Medium-Complexity Procurement (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7543/fps-1026_927616_rfp-template_medium-complexity_fr_0.pdf)

Request For Proposal documents can be found at Canadabuys ([website URL]). The following trade agreements are applicable to this procurement:

*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*
